official-title.#text:
To promote strategic sourcing principles within the
		  Federal Government.

Committee on Oversight and Government

short-title.#text:
Buy Smarter and Save Act of
			 2013

text.#text: This Act may be cited as the

header.#text:

an annual

an annual

in each of fiscal

header.#text:
Strategic
			 sourcing duties of covered departments

text.#text:
The Secretary of a
			 covered department shall take the following actions to support strategic
			 sourcing efforts in the department:

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Buy Smarter and Save Act of 2013/s:2

text.#text:
Establishment of
			 department-wide goals and savings targets for strategic sourcing efforts in
			 support of the goals established under

Establishment of a
			 strategic sourcing accountability official within the department.

Issuance of a
			 policy that outlines the role, authority, and responsibilities of the strategic
			 sourcing accountability official and department practices for strategic
			 sourcing.

Identification of
			 department-specific strategic sourcing contracts already in use and
			 establishment of utilization goals for current and future strategic sourcing
			 efforts.

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail: , consistent with the guidance and considerations under
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Buy Smarter and Save Act of 2013/s:2
Buy Smarter and Save Act of 2013/s:3

text.#text:
Development of
			 standards to track and assess compliance with the goals established under

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#tail:
, the Secretary of a covered
			 department shall conduct a spend analysis of procurements by the department
			 during fiscal year 2012 to identify, assess, and quantify goods and services
			 suitable for strategic sourcing. Based on the analysis, the Secretary shall
			 select, for implementation in fiscal year 2014, at least one good or service to
			 strategically source from among the top 20 procurement spending categories for
			 commercial goods and services that are identified in the analysis as suitable
			 for strategic sourcing.
{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.@value: Buy Smarter and Save Act of 2013/s:3

Study and report

not later than one year
			 after the date of the enactment of this Act.

In this Act:

term.#tail: has the meaning given the term

text.#text: The term

{http://namespaces.cato.org/catoxml}enti.#text: Department of Health and Human Services

text.#text: The term

quote.#tail:
means a structured and collaborative process
			 of critically analyzing an organization’s spending patterns to better leverage
			 its purchasing power, reduce costs, and improve overall value and performance.
